amendatorysection.para: A school retirement system is hereby established for the purpose of providing retirement allowances or other benefits for the school employees of the State of Nebraska as provided in the School Employees Retirement Act. It shall have the powers and privileges of a corporation, insofar as may be necessary to carry out the act, shall be known as the School Employees Retirement System of the State of Nebraska, and by such name shall transact all business as provided in the act.

crossreference.para: For retirement system for employees of Class V school districts, see the Class V School Employees Retirement Act, section 79-978.01.
